CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard School of Arts relative to Arcane University?
SRP.A: Aethelgard School of Arts is {above} Arcane University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Graduate School relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Borealis Graduate School is {above} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard School of Arts relative to Borealis Graduate School?
SRP.A: Aethelgard School of Arts is {below} Borealis Graduate School in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student enrollment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard School of Arts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student enrollment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Arcane University}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Graduate School's minimum Student Enrollment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Graduate School's minimum Student Enrollment is in {1958}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student Enrollment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student Enrollment is in {1982}.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1978, was the average total Student Enrollment higher or lower than between 1960 and 1961?
NC.A: The average total student enrollment between 1971 and 1978 was {higher} than between 1960 and 1961.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1974, did the total Student Enrollment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total student enrollment between 1961 and 1974 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1971, was the average total Student Enrollment higher or lower than between 1963 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total student enrollment between 1967 and 1971 was {higher} than between 1963 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1978, did the total Student Enrollment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total student enrollment between 1959 and 1978 was {larger} than between 1959 and 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard School of Arts} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard School of Arts and Arcane University first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard School of Arts and Arcane University first exchanged leading positions in {1959}.
